text: Tippi Hedren (born Nathalie Kay Hedren, January 19, 1930) is an American actress. Her paternal grandparents were Swedish immigrants. Her maternal ancestry is German and Norwegian. She is best known for her performances in two movies directed by Alfred Hitchcock: The Birds and Marnie. She is the mother of actress Melanie Griffith and has acted in movies with her daughter. ==References== * Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Minnesota Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: Tippi Hedren
